about.description: I'm a web and software developer. I focus on building projects that I can be proud of. I'm a fan of clean code and I'm always looking to improve my skills. I'm also a big fan of the open source community and I'm always coding something (see my Github skyline) and I'm always trying to learn new things.
about.current: I've graduated from the Graphic Lyceum Rotterdam and am currently studying Computer Science at the Rotterdam University of Applied Sciences.
about.doing: I'm the lead developer of Nexus, a FiveM server.
